TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit MailEventNotificationInfo extends System.Object

summary.span: 将关于当前事件通知的信息提供给 对象。

span.span: Provides information to the object about the current event notification.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类用于将信息传递到电子邮件模板对象时，将出现事件通知。This class is used to pass information to the email template for a object when an event notification occurs. 电子邮件模板然后格式化电子邮件消息正文的事件信息。The email template then formats the event information for the email message body. 在缓冲处于禁用状态时，将出现一条通知，事件缓冲系统发出累积事件的消息或发生的事件和事件缓冲系统为禁用。A notification occurs when buffering is disabled, the event-buffering system sends out messages for accumulated events, or an event occurs and the event-buffering system is disabled.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Events As WebBaseEventCollection

summary.span: 获取当前消息的事件的集合。

span.span: Gets a collection of events for the current message.
A of events for the current message.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property EventsDiscardedByBuffer As Integer
public: property int EventsDiscardedByBuffer { int get(); };

summary.span: 获取自上次通知以来被缓冲区丢弃的事件数。

span.span: Gets the number of events discarded by the buffer since the last notification.

value.span: 自上次通知以来被缓冲区丢弃的事件数。

span.span: The number of events discarded by the buffer since the last notification.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果缓冲区包含从上次通知的重载，则将丢弃事件。Events are discarded if the buffer has overloaded since the last notification.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property EventsDiscardedDueToMessageLimit As Integer
public: property int EventsDiscardedDueToMessageLimit { int get(); };

summary.span: 获取因为缓冲区已超出当前通知的消息上限而被缓冲区丢弃的事件数。

span.span: Gets the number of events that are discarded by the buffer because the buffer has exceeded the message limit for the current notification.

value.span: 因为缓冲区已超出当前通知的消息上限而被缓冲区丢弃的事件数。

span.span: The number of events discarded by the buffer because the buffer has exceeded the message limit for the current notification.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 消息限制指定在单个通知，这是最大每个通知的消息数过程中发送的消息的最大数乘以最大允许每个消息的事件数。The message limit specifies the maximum number of messages that are sent during a single notification, which is the maximum number of messages per notification multiplied by the maximum number of events allowed per message. 这些值都由指定`maxEventsPerMessage`和`maxMessagesPerNotification`中的相应的提供程序子节的特性`healthMonitoring`配置文件中的部分。These values are specified by the `maxEventsPerMessage` and the `maxMessagesPerNotification` attributes in the appropriate provider sub-section of the `healthMonitoring` section in a configuration file. 当事件缓冲系统发出累积事件的消息时，将出现一条通知。A notification occurs when the event-buffering system sends out messages for accumulated events. 这可能是因为缓冲区已聚合最大允许数目的事件，因为之间发送事件的时间间隔已过期，或者运行状况监视系统已请求缓冲区刷新。This may occur because the buffer has accumulated the maximum allowed number of events, because the time interval between sending events has expired, or because the health-monitoring system has requested a buffer flush. 将整个事件缓冲区发送到在尽可能少消息中作为可能的收件人基于`maxEventsPerMessage`值。The entire event buffer is sent to the recipients in as few messages as possible, based on the `maxEventsPerMessage` value. 中指定了缓冲区设置`bufferModes`的小节`healthMonitoring`配置文件中的部分。Buffer settings are specified in the `bufferModes` subsection of the `healthMonitoring` section in a configuration file.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property EventsInBuffer As Integer
public: property int EventsInBuffer { int get(); };

summary.span: 获取在当前通知之后仍然留在缓冲区中的事件数。

span.span: Gets the number of events remaining in the buffer after the current notification.

value.span: 在当前通知之后仍然留在缓冲区中的事件数。

span.span: The number of events remaining in the buffer after the current notification.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property EventsInNotification As Integer
public: property int EventsInNotification { int get(); };

summary.span: 获取正在为当前通知处理的事件数。

span.span: Gets the number of events being processed for the current notification.

value.span: 正在为当前通知处理的事件数。

span.span: The number of events being processed for the current notification.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此计数仅包括当前的通知的事件，且不包括事件缓冲区而被丢弃或因为消息限制而被排除。This count only includes events for the current notification and does not include events dropped by the buffer or excluded because of the message limit.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property EventsRemaining As Integer
public: property int EventsRemaining { int get(); };

summary.span: 获取在当前通知之后仍然留在缓冲区中的事件数。

span.span: Gets the number of events remaining in the buffer after the current notification.

value.span: 在当前通知之后仍然留在缓冲区中的事件数。

span.span: The number of events remaining in the buffer after the current notification.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此计数不包括事件缓冲区而被丢弃或因为消息限制而被排除。This count does not include events dropped by the buffer or excluded because of the message limit.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property LastNotificationUtc As DateTime
public: property DateTime LastNotificationUtc { DateTime get(); };

summary.span: 获取前一次通知的时间。

span.span: Gets the time of the previous notification.

value.span: 指定前一次通知的时间的 对象。

span.span: A object that specifies the time of the previous notification.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Message As MailMessage
public: property System::Net::Mail::MailMessage ^ Message { System::Net::Mail::MailMessage ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取作为当前邮件发送的电子邮件。

span.span: Gets the email message that will be sent as the current message.

value.span: A ，它指定要发送的电子邮件消息。

span.span: A that specifies the email message to send.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 提供此属性的对象已完成消息正文，即该模板将创建的部分除外。The object provided by this property is complete except for the message body, which is the part the template creates. 模板可以修改的值对象，如果适用。The template can modify the values of the object, if appropriate.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property MessageSequence As Integer
public: property int MessageSequence { int get(); };

summary.span: 获取此消息在当前通知的序列中的位置。

span.span: Gets the position of this message in the sequence for the current notification.

value.span: 此消息在当前通知序列中的位置。

span.span: The position of this message in the sequence for the current notification.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 第一条消息对从 1 开始的序列号。The sequence numbers start at 1 for the first message.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property MessagesInNotification As Integer
public: property int MessagesInNotification { int get(); };

summary.span: 获取当前通知中的消息总数。

span.span: Gets the total number of messages in the current notification.

value.span: 当前通知中的消息总数。

span.span: The total number of messages in the current notification.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property NotificationSequence As Integer
public: property int NotificationSequence { int get(); };

summary.span: 获取此通知在截止目前发出的通知总数中的位置。

span.span: Gets the position of this notification within the total number of notifications made to date.

value.span: 此通知在截止目前发出的通知总数中的位置。

span.span: The position of this notification within the total number of notifications made to date.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 对第一个通知从 1 开始的序列号。The sequence numbers start at 1 for the first notification.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property NotificationType As EventNotificationType

span.span: Gets the type of the current notification.
The for the current notification.
